scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('src','data');const dst=path.resolve('build','data');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true,force:true});console.error('Copied data:',src,'->',dst);}else{console.error('No src/data to copy');}"
